noFilteredFiles: No files match the search term
cannotShowDiff: Can not diff content of type
toBeginning: Show all lines to the beginning of the file
linesAbove: Show {{lines}} more lines for the code above
linesBelow: Show {{lines}} more lines for the code below
toEnd: Show all lines to the end of this file
clearRead: Clear the read status of this file
collapse: Collapse all inline comments for this file
expand: Expand all inline comments for this file
